column4: ok - so how would i install a .tar.gz game. i downloaded it, unzipped it to a folder, and now i cant figure out how to run it...
.tar.gz can mean a whole lot of different things (and with them, methods).  What game is it?
alien arena is in the repos already.  Delete the targz, the stuff you downloaded.  Open synaptic, and install the "alien-arena" package
System > Administration > Synaptic Package Manager, and for instructions on usage: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SynapticHowto
